sqlMap.select:
select count(a.id) from user_info a where 1=1
a.userAcct like '%$userAcct$%'
a.deleteFlag=#deleteFlag#

select distinct a.id,a.userAcct,a.userPass,concat(concat(concat(a.userName,'('),a.userAcct),')') as userName,a.deleteFlag from user_info a where 1=1
a.userAcct like '%$userAcct$%'
a.deleteFlag=#deleteFlag#
order by $orderby$

select distinct c.menu_todo from menu_info c where ( c.id in ( select distinct b.menu_id from user_menu b where b.user_id = ( select a.id from user_info a where a.userAcct='$login_user_acct$' ) ) or c.id in ( select distinct b.menu_id from role_menu b where b.role_id = ( select a.userType from user_info a where a.userAcct='$login_user_acct$' ) ) or c.is_default=1 ) and c.menu_status=#menu_status#

select distinct a.menu_todo from menu_info a where 1=1
a.status = #menu_status#
a.menu_type = #menu_type#

select table_a.* , (select count(menu_info.id) from menu_info where menu_info.f_id = table_a.id) as leaf_count from ( select id,menu_name as text,f_id,menu_status,menu_todo,menu_type,is_default,frontS from menu_info a )table_a where table_a.f_id = #nowId# and menu_status = 1
select count(id) from user_menu where user_id='$userID$' and menu_id=#menu_id#
select count(id) from role_menu where role_id='$roleID$' and menu_id=#menu_id#
select distinct a.projectName from user_data a where a.userId=#userId#
